channel.title: Connectors (Pro) on DefectDojo Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Connectors (Pro) on DefectDojo Documentation

item.title: About Connectors
item.description:
Note: Connectors are a DefectDojo Pro-only feature.

DefectDojo allows users to build sophisticated API integrations, and gives users full control over how their vulnerability data is organized.

item.title: Add or Edit a Connector
item.description:
Note: Connectors are a DefectDojo Pro-only feature.

The process for adding and configuring a connector is similar, regardless of the tool youâ€™re trying to connect. However, certain tools may require you to create API keys or complete additional steps.

item.title: Managing Operations
item.description:
Note: Connectors are a DefectDojo Pro-only feature.

Once an API connector is set up, it will run two Operations on a recurring basis:

item.title: Managing Records
item.description:
Note: Connectors are a DefectDojo Pro-only feature.

Once you have run your first Discover operation, you should see a list of Mapped or Unmapped records on the Manage Records and Operations page.

item.title: Tool-Specific Connector Setup
item.description:
Note: Connectors are a DefectDojo Pro-only feature.

When setting up a Connector for a supported tool, you’ll need to give DefectDojo specific information related to the tool’s API. At a base level, you’ll need:
